meanings.definition: A small mass of dust and lint.
meanings.sent1: I found a few dustballs under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The vacuum cleaner picked up the dustballs easily.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the dustballs, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The room was so dusty, it seemed to be filled with floating dustballs.
meanings.sent5: As I cleaned, I noticed the dustballs multiplying like tiny tumbleweeds.

meanings.definition: To remove dustballs from a surface.
meanings.sent1: I need to dustballs the shelves before guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: She dustballsed the curtains to make the room look cleaner.
meanings.sent3: He dustballsed the table vigorously, sending the dustballs flying.
meanings.sent4: The maid dustballsed the entire house in just an hour.
meanings.sent5: After she dustballsed the bookshelf, it looked brand new.
